 Conversion of implicit substitution to explicit substitution. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jun-1994.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 4-Oct-2016.)  (Revised by Wolf Lammen, 30-Apr-2018.)
statement:
sbie.1 $e |- F/ x ps $.
sbie.2 $e |- ( x = y -> ( ph <-> ps ) ) $.
sbie $p |- ( [ y / x ] ph <-> ps ) $.
